ABOUT US

Our Mission

Our mission is to connect with women all over the world through beauty. We help transmit information about enhancing beauty to women. We help resolve social issues through beauty education. We provide employment in the beauty industry. Our goal is to make women more glamorous.

Our Vision

Lucia Lash/Brow is an appointment-based salon. This allows us to be client focused so that we can provide the best service and experience to each customer.

Our Product

We use Keratin based products that will help to maintain strength and prevent damage, such as dryness and breakage, to lash and brow hairs.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_zigzag][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top” kd_background_overlay=”true”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1597847545062{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top” css=”.vc_custom_1605635100320{padding-top: 100px !important;}”][vc_column_inner]

Lucia Lash/Brow

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top” css=”.vc_custom_1605635075384{padding-bottom: 85px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1597847803881{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_hoverbox image=”9990″ primary_title=”” hover_title=”Tomo Moore” use_custom_fonts_primary_title=”true”]Founder Tomoe Moore was born in Japan. She specializes in cosmetology and permanent makeup which had landed her careers in Tokyo, Paris and New York.
Her experiences from different countries allowed her to hone her skills and perfect her technique and design for all types of clients. Armed with her extensive experience, skills and the best quality products from Europe and Japan, Lucia Lash opened in Greenwich Village, New York in 2015 specializing in eyelash extensions, skincare and permanent makeup. Some of her clienteles include singers, Victoria Secret Models and actresses to name a few. Her success allowed her to open up a new location in center city Philadelphia, PA.[/vc_hoverbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_zigzag][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top” kd_background_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1606228622578{padding-top: 100px !important;}”][vc_column]

What our clients say is important to us

We’re obsessive about knowledge transfer, so whenever we’ve
developed a unique solution for your business.
